name: International Congress on Pediatrics
content: Global Pediatrics 2023 is an International platform for an adverse study about early detection as well as treatment care based on Professional standards, and intense research on whole Pediatrics. The conference contains significant international experts in Scientists, Pediatric Doctors, Pediatric Nurses, research scholars and general practitioners, Student Delegates, and Exhibitors from all over the world to our Physical conference with the theme “Enlightening the advancements and exploring the new horizons in Pediatrics”. Physical conferences will be featuring oral presentations, poster presentations, keynote talks, workshops, and many more.
